settings.custom_liquid:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ 'book-call.css' | asset_url }}">
<style id="nb-bookcall-all">
/* ================================
   BOOK A CALL — page-scoped tokens
   ================================ */
main[data-template="page.book-call"]{
  --nb-shell-w: min(1160px, 94vw);
  --nb-sage: #E6ECEA;                 /* soft panel bg */
  --nb-chocolate: #C86B2A;            /* CTA */
  --nb-choc-600: #9E4E19;             /* CTA hover */
  --nb-shadow-1: 0 10px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.06);
  --nb-shadow-2: 0 6px 20px rgba(0,0,0,.10);
}

/* =====================
   HERO — CTA pill style
   ===================== */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] .hero__container a,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] :is(a,button)[class*="button"],
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] :is(a,button).button,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] .button--primary,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] .btn{
  font-size: clamp(17px, 2.1vw, 19px) !important;
  padding: 12px 24px !important;
  border-radius: 9999px !important;
  background: var(--nb-chocolate) !important;
  border-color: var(--nb-chocolate) !important;
  color: #fff !important;
  line-height: 1.1 !important;
  box-shadow: var(--nb-shadow-1) !important;
  transition: background-color .15s, box-shadow .2s, transform .08s !important;
}
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] .hero__container a:hover,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] :is(a,button)[class*="button"]:hover,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] .button--primary:hover,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id*="_hero_"] .btn:hover{
  background: var(--nb-choc-600) !important;
  border-color: var(--nb-choc-600) !important;
  color:#fff !important;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: var(--nb-shadow-2) !important;
}

/* ======================================
   WHAT TO EXPECT — nb_multicol_tQXMEW
   ====================================== */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"]{
  background: transparent !important;
  padding: clamp(24px,3vw,48px) 0 !important;
}
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] > *{
  max-width: var(--nb-shell-w) !important;
  margin-inline:auto !important;
}
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .nb-grid,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .grid,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .multicolumn{
  display:grid !important;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr)) !important;
  gap: clamp(14px,2vw,22px) !important;

  background: var(--nb-sage) !important;     /* soft panel (not full bleed) */
  border-radius: 18px !important;
  padding: clamp(16px,2vw,24px) !important;
  box-shadow: var(--nb-shadow-1) !important;
}
@media (max-width: 960px){
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .nb-grid,
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .grid,
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .multicolumn{
    grid-template-columns: 1fr !important;
  }
}
/* Cards inside the panel */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .nb-grid > *,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .grid > *,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] .multicolumn > *{
  height:100% !important;
  display:flex !important;
  flex-direction:column !important;
  gap:.6rem !important;
  padding: clamp(16px,2vw,22px) !important;
  background:#fff !important;
  border-radius:14px !important;
  box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.05) !important;
}
/* keep plain bullets (no decorative ticks) */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] li::before{ content:none !important; }
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] ul{
  list-style: disc !important; padding-left:1.1rem !important; margin:.25rem 0 0 !important;
}
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__nb_multicol_tQXMEW"] li{ margin:.35rem 0 !important; }

/* ==================================================
   IS THIS FOR YOU? — cards_multicol_list_nibana_E8DyQJ
   ================================================== */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__cards_multicol_list_nibana_E8DyQJ"]{
  background: transparent !important;
  padding: clamp(24px,3vw,48px) 0 !important;
}
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__cards_multicol_list_nibana_E8DyQJ"] > *{
  max-width: var(--nb-shell-w) !important;      /* match previous section width */
  margin-inline:auto !important;
  background: var(--nb-sage) !important;        /* outer panel */
  border-radius: 18px !important;
  padding: clamp(18px,2.4vw,28px) !important;
  box-shadow: var(--nb-shadow-1) !important;
}
/* White list card (no ticks) */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__cards_multicol_list_nibana_E8DyQJ"] :where(ul,ol){
  width:100% !important;
  background:#fff !important;
  border-radius:14px !important;
  padding: clamp(18px,2.6vw,30px) clamp(22px,3.2vw,36px) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.05) !important;
  margin:0 !important;

  list-style:none !important;                    /* remove ticks/bullets */
  padding-left:0 !important;
}
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__cards_multicol_list_nibana_E8DyQJ"] :where(ul,ol) > li{
  padding:.7rem 0 !important;
  border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06);
}
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__cards_multicol_list_nibana_E8DyQJ"] :where(ul,ol) > li:first-child{ border-top:0; }
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__cards_multicol_list_nibana_E8DyQJ"] :where(ul,ol) > li::before{ content:none !important; }
</style>

<style id="nb-bookcall-calendly">
/* SECTION: Calendly (custom_liquid_KVph3d) — single tray + desktop UI */

main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__custom_liquid_KVph3d"]{
  background: transparent !important;
  padding: clamp(24px,3vw,48px) 0 !important;
}

/* Kill any theme wrapper styling so we don't get a second tray */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__custom_liquid_KVph3d"] > :not(.nb-cal-wrap){
  background: transparent !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
}

/* Our single soft tray */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__custom_liquid_KVph3d"] .nb-cal-wrap{
  max-width: min(1160px, 94vw) !important;
  margin-inline: auto !important;
  background: var(--nb-sage, #E6ECEA) !important;
  border-radius: 18px !important;
  box-shadow: var(--nb-shadow-1, 0 10px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.06)) !important;
  padding: clamp(18px,2.2vw,28px) !important;
}

/* Calendly card — keep full width to stay in desktop layout */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__custom_liquid_KVph3d"] .nb-cal-wrap .calendly-inline-widget{
  width: 100% !important;           /* use the whole tray */
  max-width: none !important;
  min-width: 980px !important;      /* desktop UI threshold */
  height: 760px !important;
  margin: 0 auto !important;
  background: #fff !important;
  border-radius: 14px !important;
  overflow: hidden !important;
  box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.05) !important;
}

/* Make the inner iframe match the rounded card */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__custom_liquid_KVph3d"] .calendly-inline-widget iframe{
  width: 100% !important;
  height: 100% !important;
  border: 0 !important;
  border-radius: 14px !important;
}

/* On small screens allow responsive width and add height */
@media (max-width: 980px){
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__custom_liquid_KVph3d"] .calendly-inline-widget{
    min-width: 0 !important;        /* stop forcing desktop on phones */
    height: 1000px !important;       /* more room for mobile UI */
  }
}
</style>

<style id="nb-bookcall-testimonials">
/* ============================================
   TESTIMONIALS — section __testimonials_BWp3qd
   Tray + grid + polished cards, no arrows
   ============================================ */

main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"]{
  background: transparent !important;
  padding: clamp(28px, 3.5vw, 56px) 0 !important;
}

/* Use the inner .page-width (Dawn) as our single tray */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .page-width{
  max-width: min(1160px, 94vw) !important;
  margin-inline: auto !important;
  background: var(--nb-sage, #E6ECEA) !important;
  border-radius: 18px !important;
  box-shadow: var(--nb-shadow-1, 0 10px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.06)) !important;
  padding: clamp(18px, 2vw, 28px) !important;
}

/* Section heading */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] h2,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .title{
  text-align: center !important;
  margin: 0 0 clamp(18px, 2vw, 26px) !important;
}

/* Replace any slider layout with a responsive grid */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slider,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slideshow,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .testimonials,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .grid{
  display: grid !important;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr)) !important;
  gap: clamp(14px, 2vw, 22px) !important;
}

/* Hide arrows/dots from whatever the theme uses */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slider-buttons,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slider-button,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slideshow__controls,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .swiper-button-prev,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .swiper-button-next,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .swiper-pagination{
  display: none !important;
}

/* Testimonial cards (theme slide items get different class names; cover broadly) */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slider > *,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slideshow__slide,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .testimonials__item,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .card,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .testimonial{
  background: #fff !important;
  border-radius: 14px !important;
  box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.05) !important;
  padding: clamp(16px, 1.8vw, 22px) !important;
  height: 100% !important;
  display: flex !important;
  flex-direction: column !important;
}

/* Name / role / stars polish (selectors are broad to catch theme variations) */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .card__heading,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .testimonial__author,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .author{
  font-weight: 700 !important;
  margin-bottom: 4px !important;
}

main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .author__meta,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .testimonial__role{
  opacity: .75 !important;
  font-size: .95em !important;
  margin-bottom: 10px !important;
}

main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .rating,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .stars{
  color: var(--nb-teal, #0D6B6B) !important;
  margin-bottom: 10px !important;
}

/* Responsive: 2 cols tablet, 1 col mobile */
@media (max-width: 1024px){
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slider,
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slideshow,
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .testimonials,
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .grid{
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr)) !important;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 680px){
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slider,
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slideshow,
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .testimonials,
  main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .grid{
    grid-template-columns: 1fr !important;
  }
}
</style>

<style id="nb-testimonials-tweak">
/* Slightly larger gap + softer card shadow while keeping full-bleed */
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .page-width{
  padding: clamp(26px,3vw,40px) !important;
}
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slider > *,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .slideshow__slide,
main[data-template="page.book-call"] [id$="__testimonials_BWp3qd"] .testimonials__item{
  box-shadow: 0 10px 24px rgba(0,0,0,.06) !important;
}
</style>

settings.text: A no-pressure chat to explore where you are, what “aligned success” looks like, and whether we’re a fit

settings.heading: 20 min connection call
settings.text:
We get to know each other and check fit.

  • Your current situation
  • What you want to change
  • Whether we’re a good fit

settings.heading: 60-90 min deep-dive call
settings.text:
We go into the details in this call.

  • Define outcomes clearly
  • Surface what’s in the way
  • Map a first practical move

settings.heading: Offers & next steps
settings.text:
Only if it feels right for both of us.

  • Options & cadence
  • Investment & logistics
  • You decide—no pressure

settings.items:
Successful on paper, but it doesn’t feel how you thought it would
Want presence and connection, not just performance
Ready to look honestly at patterns and make changes
Prefer straight, respectful conversations over fluff
Want a coach who has been where you are

settings.name: Sunil Singh
settings.title: Entrepreneur
settings.testimonial: Working with Kapil who has the ability to hold your energy and help you figure out how to direct it in purposeful ways, has helped me expand my ability to navigate life more creatively. It’s allowed me to be in acceptance of who I am as a person and provided me the tools to have a peace of mind.

settings.name: P P
settings.title: Business Owner
settings.testimonial: I was going through separation and was struggling with self-worth and hadn’t had any sex in years. I was full of anxiety and fears about meeting women. I am amazed how my life changed since last year Sex is great. I forgot how good sex could be!

settings.name: Christopher Thomas
settings.title: Club Quarter Hotels
settings.testimonial: I’ve had the honour of working with Kapil for the last few months and each and every session has always left me with an “aha” moment. His insightfulness, guidance and compassion has truly been a blessing. I never thought that I would need a “coach” when Kapil was recommended to me yet now I have a better understanding of my fears, more clarity around my desires, and certainty about the life that I want to live. For that, I’m truly grateful. I would highly recommend Kapil

settings.q: Will we coach in the 20-min call?
settings.a: The first call is a connection and fit check. We’ll get to know each other and explore where you are, and what you are looking for. If it feels right to both of us, we’ll book a longer deep-dive call to go into the details

settings.q: What’s the difference between the 20-min call and the 60–90-min deep-dive?
settings.a:
YourThe deep-dive is where we go into the details. We’ll:

Define clear outcomes
Surface patterns and what’s getting in the way
Explain my coaching process

By the end, I will make an offer based on our conversation that would include investment, cadence, and logistics so you know exactly how it could look.

You can say Yes or No to the offer at this point

settings.q: Do I have to decide on the call?
settings.a:
I ask that you make a clear decision by the end of the second call, just so that it feels energetically clean.

Don't worry, No is always an acceptable answer.

And if there's still an appropriate reason to take more time to decide, then we can discuss that too.

settings.q: How do we meet—and what about time zones?
settings.a: Sessions are usually on Zoom. Calendly shows times in your local time zone automatically. If you need a different time or format, just mention it in the notes and we’ll make it work.
